name: Don Diego - Don Diego Fuerte by Omar Ortez - Belicoso
brand: Don Diego, Don Diego Fuerte by Omar Ortez
additionalNotes:
Don Diego cigars have long been a favored premium blend for those seeking a mellow experience. Known for its classic creamy Dominican profile, full-bodied fans had been left out in the cold until legendary blender Omar Ortez stepped up to the plate with his bolder interpretation of this classic line. 
Don Diego Fuerte comes dressed in an Ecuadorian Cubano wrapper nestling a blend of Nicaraguan and Dominican long-fillers that mesh together marvelously, delivering a creamy but full-flavored assault on the palate. Full-bodied and unrelenting, this premium blend will dish out a large helping of flavors including rich earth, nutmeg, cinnamon, pepper, and cedar.
